data.title: Four by Truffaut: The Adventures of Antoine Doinel by François Truffaut (Eng.)
data.meta_description: New York. Simon & Schuster. 1971 (1970). Softcover. Book Condition: Near Fine, slight shelf wear. 320pp. (ill. in b/w).Screenplays and stills from four of François Truffaut's films:  'The 400 Blows', 'Love at Twenty', 'Stolen Kisses', and 'Bed and Board'.Trans. from the French by Helen G. Scott.Text in English.

This product is currently sold out.

New York. Simon & Schuster. 1971 (1970). Softcover. Book Condition: Near Fine, slight shelf wear. 320pp. (ill. in b/w).

Screenplays and stills from four of François Truffaut's films: 'The 400 Blows', 'Love at Twenty', 'Stolen Kisses', and 'Bed and Board'.

Trans. from the French by Helen G. Scott.

Text in English.
